Forbidden and Arcanus[--禁忌和奥术--]
Welcome to &5Forbidden \\&\\ Arcanus![--欢迎来到&5禁制PPP\\c奥术!--]
Forbidden \\&\\ Arcanus adds new ways to get better armor, enchants, and more![--禁用PPP\\\ Arcanus增加了获得更好的盔甲、附魔和更多的新方式!--]
This magic-themed mod has amazing animations, as well as some overpowered items like the &6Eternal Stella&r. [--这个魔法主题mod有令人惊叹的动画,以及一些压倒性强的物品,比如&6永恒恒星&r.--]
Welcome to Forbidden \\&\\ Arcanus![--欢迎来到禁止PPP\\c奥术!--]
Edelwood Trees[--埃德木树--]
Found within the Dark Forest biome, the Edelwood Tree looks like a small tree that has been chopped in half.[--在黑暗森林生物群系中发现,埃德木树看起来像一棵被切成两半的小树。--]
You'll need to break the branches off and collect the logs, as these are used for crafting various items within the mod.[--您需要分解树枝并收集原木,因为它们用于在mod中制作各种物品。--]
A Silk-Touch Pickaxe[--精准采集镐--]
The Mystical Dagger is used to break Dragon Heads down to Dragon Scales.[--神秘匕首用于将龙头破碎成龙鳞。--]
When killing mobs with it with a test tube in your inventory, it will also collect blood.[--当用你的物品栏中的测试管道杀死怪物时,它也会收集血液.--]
The Edelwood bucket can store more than one bucket of liquid, and can also be used to capture small animals like chickens or squids.[--埃德木桶可以存储一个以上的桶液体,也可以用于捕捉小动物,比如鸡或鱿鱼。--]
You'll need the Permafrost enchant to use it to carry Lava.[--您需要永冻石附魔来使用它来携带熔岩.--]
Arcane Crystals[--奥术水晶--]
This is the main resource in the mod. Go out and mine some![--这是mod中的主要资源。出去挖一些!--]
Nipa Plants[--尼帕植物--]
Have you seen the random floating island in the sky? Not the slime one, but the tiny one?[--你见过空中随机漂浮的岛屿吗?不是史莱姆的,而是小的?--]
These have the Nipa plant on them. You can break these and relocate them.[--这些有Nipa的植物。你可以破坏它们并移动它们.--]
They produce Arcane Crystal Dust Specks over time, which can be used to create Arcane Crystal Dust.[--它们随时间产生奥术水晶粉,可用于制造奥术水晶粉。--]
Smelting down Arcane Crystals will give you Arcane Crystal Dust.[--熔炼奥术水晶会给你奥术水晶粉。--]
This is used for most of the items in the mod.[--它用于mod中的大多数物品。--]
Breaking spawners will now drop &9Spawner Scraps&r.[--破坏刷怪笼现在会掉落&9刷怪笼碎片&r.--]
Entity Tools[--实体工具--]
The &9Quantum Catcher&r is used to capture and transport mobs.[--&9量子捕捉器&r用于捕捉和传送生物.--]
Highlights Mobs when Activated[--激活时高亮显示怪物--]
This gives X-Ray vision for mobs, highlighting them from afar to make it easier to spot them.[--这为怪物提供X射线视线,从远处显示它们以更容易发现它们.--]
Use on Farmland to make it Magical![--在耕地上使用来让它变魔法!--]
Using this bone meal on Farmland will convert it to Magical Farmland.[--在耕地上使用这顿骨粉会将其转化为魔法农田。--]
Crops will produce double the output when grown on Magical Farmland.[--当种植在魔法农场上时,作物产出将翻倍.--]
Growing Gold[--生长中的金--]
These can be planted to grow Arcane Gold Nuggets.[--这些可以种植成奥术金粒。--]
To create one, you'll need to find Yellow Orchids.[--要制作一个,你需要找到黄色兰花。--]
Dragon Scales[--龙鳞--]
Dragon Scales, Dragon Scales.....[--龙鳞,龙鳞......--]
Combining a Dragon Head with a Mystical Dagger will give you &9Dragon Scales&r.[--将龙头和神秘匕首结合,会给你&9龙鳞&r.--]
&1Draco Arcanus Armor&r[--&1Draco Arcanus护甲&r--]
Better than Netherite[--比下界合金更好--]
The Dragon Scale can be made into a Golden and Aquatic Dragon Scales.[--龙鳞可以做成金和水生龙鳞。--]
These are mainly used to craft &dTyr Armor&r. It is also needed in the ATM Star recipe.[--这些主要用于制作&dTyr盔甲&r.ATM Star配方中也需要它.--]
Used to corrupt Souls and Runes. You'll need this for later.[--用于腐化灵魂和符文。之后你需要它。--]

If you throw down Dark Matter, then throw down Corrupti Dust, it'll create a Black Hole. Feed it small entities like Arrows or Experience Orbs, and it'll produce Xpetrified Orbs.[--如果你扔下暗物质,然后扔下腐化尘土,它会生成一个黑洞。喂它小实体,比如箭或经验宝珠,它会生成Xpetrifed Obs.--]
Mundabitur Dust[--Mundabiture粉--]
Let the Dusts Combine[--让尘土融合--]
Using our Arcane Crystal Dust, we'll need to combine it with other dusts and powders to create Mundabiter Dust.[--使用奥术水晶粉,我们需要与其他粉尘和粉尘结合,以产生普通粉尘。--]
This dust is used in several recipes, as well as activating the Hephaestus Forge.[--这种尘土用于几种配方,同时激活Hephaestus Forge.--]
&6Deorum Ingots[--&6暗影锭--]
The &6Deorum Ingots&r is needed to continue your progression in the mod.[--需要&6末影锭&r来继续你的mod。--]
It's used for a lot of stuff.[--它用于许多东西。--]
&5Tyr Armor[--&5泰尔盔甲--]
Sanity[--神性--]
Am I going insane?[--我会发狂吗?--]
Killing passive mobs will increase your corruption. Killing &9Aureal Entities&r has a higher chance to increase your corruption.[--杀死被动生物会增加你的腐化。杀死&9自然实体&r有更高的几率增加你的腐化。--]
Be careful! At higher levels of corruption, negative things will happen![--注意!在更高的腐化等级下,会发生负面事件!--]
Making a Sanity Meter will give your UI an upgrade to show your total corruption, for those who want to hit new high scores and such.[--制作一个圣洁仪将给您的UI一个升级,以显示你的完全腐化,对于想要达到新的高分的人来说。--]
&1The Hephaestus Forge[--&1血肉锻炉--]
This forge allows you to perform rituals to obtain powerful items. It can also be upgrade.[--这个锻造炉可以让你进行仪式来获得强大的物品。它也可以升级。--]
We'll be using all of that Darkstone to create the &6Hephaestus Forge&r.[--我们将使用所有这些黑暗石来制作&6血肉锻炉&r.--]
Once you have all of the blocks needed, you'll need to build the platform for the forge.[--一旦你拥有了所需的所有方块,你需要为锻造台建造平台。--]
Once built, place a Smithing Table in the center, then sneak+right-click with a piece of Mundabitur Dust.[--建造后,在中心放置一个锻造台,然后潜行+右键单击一个Mundabiturar粉。--]
The &9Lens of Veritatis&r is used to see Aureal entities.[--&9VeritatisLens&r用于查看Aureal实体.--]
These are entities that will grant Aureal when killed, but will also increase your corruption....[--这些实体在杀死后会获得AuReal,但也会增加你的腐化......--]
Smelting &9Edelwood&r will give you Dark Matter.[--冶炼&9埃德木&r会给你暗物质.--]
You can make Black Holes with this.[--你可以用它制作黑洞。--]
Blood is collected by crafting Test Tubes, then killing mobs with the Mystical Dagger.[--血液通过制作测试管收集,然后用神秘匕首杀死生物。--]
Note: The Test Tube must be in your inventory when killing mobs.[--注意:在杀死生物时,测试管必须放在你的物品栏中。--]
&9Aureal[--&9Aureal--]
&dAureal Bottles&r can be found in loot chests, but they can also be crafted using Arcane Crystal Dust.[--&d灵气瓶&r可以在战利品箱中找到,但它们也可以使用奥术水晶粉制作.--]
You can also generate Aureal with Arcane Crystal Obelisks.[--你也可以用奥术水晶方尖碑产生绿宝石。--]
&dSouls[--&d灵魂--]
Souls are gathered by creating a &9Soul Extractor&r, and then using it on Soul Sand.[--通过制作&9灵魂提取器&r来收集灵魂,然后在灵魂沙上使用.--]
&aBottle O' Enchanting[--&a瓶子O'附魔--]
Experience in a bottle[--瓶子里的经验--]
This goes in the right side of the forge.[--它会进入锻造厂的右侧。--]
The Forge requires 4 different items to be powered: Aureal, Souls, Blood, and Experience.[--Forge需要4种不同的物品供能:AUReal,灵魂,血液和经验。--]
To learn more, follow the corner quests.[--要了解更多,请跟随角落任务。--]
Powering the Forge[--给锻造台供电--]
Darkstone Pedestals[--黑暗石基座--]
To enchant items, you'll need Darkstone Pedestals placed around the Forge.[--要附魔物品,你需要放置在锻造台周围的暗黑石基座。--]
Make sure to place these on the Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone.[--一定要把它们放在磨制奥术制暗黑石上.--]
Performing Rituals[--进行仪式--]
To perform a ritual, place the ingredients on the Arcane Pedestals.[--要进行仪式,请将材料放在奥术基座上。--]
You'll need a &9Blacksmith's Gavel&r to activate the ritual. To do this, right click on the Forge with the Gavel.[--你需要一个&9铁匠锤&r来激活仪式。要这样做,请用锤子右键单击FEGE.--]
Blacksmith Gavel[--铁匠锤--]
&1Draco Tools[--&1Draco工具--]
Dragon Tools[--龙工具--]
&1Draco Weapons[--&1Draco武器--]
Go Pew Pew[--去PewPew--]
The Scepter shoots out energy orbs when charged up with Right-Click. If a mob is hit, it'll strike it with lightning.[--权杖在充能右击时会发射能量球。如果怪物被击中,它会用闪电击中它。--]
To create an Arcane Crystal Obelisk, place down an Arcane Polished Darkstone block, then place two Arcane Crystal Blocks on top of it.[--要制作一个奥术水晶方尖碑,请放置一个磨制奥术暗黑石块,然后在上面放两个奥术水晶块。--]
Right-click with Mundabitur Dust and you'll create the obelisk.[--用Mundabitur粉右键单击,你就会制作方尖碑.--]
When placed on a Arcane Chiseled Polished Darkstone block on the Hephaestus Forge structure, it will slowly generate Aureal over time.[--当放置在Hephaestus Forge结构上的奥术制磨制暗黑石块上时,随着时间的推移,它会缓慢产生AUDERI。--]
Arcane Crystal Obelisks[--奥术水晶方尖碑--]
Clibano Building[--Clibano Building--]
not implemented yet[--尚未执行--]
The sea modifier[--海之强化--]

The Sea Prism applies the Aquatic modifier to helmets allows breaking blocks while swimming without a speed decrease and grants you some additional regeneration while in water[--海晶石对头盔施加水生升级,允许在不降低速度的情况下破坏方块,在水下可以给你一些额外的再生效果--]
Demolishing modifier[--销毁升级--]

The demolishing modifier can unlock the true power out of your tools (Pickaxes, Shovels, Axes, Hoes). Tools with this modifier will be able to break a 3x3 area.[--拆除升级可以解锁你工具(镐子、锹子、斧子、锄子)的真正电源。使用此升级工具可以破坏3x3的区域。--]
Magnetized modifier[--磁化强化器--]

The magnetized modifier can only be used on Boots. When boots with this modifier are equipped, the item pick-up range of the player will increase by one and a half blocks.[--磁化强化器只能用于靴子上。当装备了该强化器的靴子时,玩家的物品拾取范围将增加一个半方块.--]
Fiery modifier[--炽热强化器--]

The fiery modifier can be applied to all tool items (Pickaxes, Shovels, Axes, Hoes) and will automatically smelt all mined blocks if they have a smelting recipe[--火热升级可以应用于所有工具物品(镐子、锹子、斧子、锄子),如果有冶炼配方,将自动烧炼所有矿块--]
Eternal modifier[--永恒强化--]
Removes the durability from an item[--从物品中移除耐久--]
